title: QuizRush
description: Speed thinking or face the chase!
atmosphereText: Speed thinking or face the chase.
atmosphereText1: You don't know who is behind you
atmosphereText2: Screams of fear were heard everywhere
atmosphereText3: You have to be right or you'll be caught
joinDescription: Enter the room code below to play.
hostDescription: Create a new room to play
settingsDescription: Choose your chaser and set up your game!
warningText: WARNING: This game contains horror elements that may not be suitable for all players

zombie.name: Zombie
zombie.description: Slow but relentless. Will keep chasing without stopping.

monster1.name: Mad Mutant
monster1.description: Moves quickly with unpredictable patterns. Hard to anticipate.

monster2.name: Hellhound
monster2.description: Tracks its prey from afar. Speed increases when close to the target.

monster3.name: Slaughter Samurai
monster3.description: Moves with deadly precision. Strikes suddenly.

darknight.name: Dark King
darknight.description: Controls darkness itself. Speed and movement patterns vary.

errorMessages.joinFailed: Failed to join game! Try again later.

selectQuizDescription: Choose a quiz to start your adventure!
characterSelectDescription: Select your chaser and configure your game settings!
question: Questions
shareCode: Share game code to invite friends!
atmosphereTexts: The air smells of iron and regret...
Can you feel it crawling on your skin?

performance.noData: Your trace is still hidden in the mist... rise and try again!
performance.perfect: Awesome! You conquered the night perfectly! A true legend!
performance.eliminated: Darkness challenged you this time, but your spirit still burns! Try again, hero!
performance.accuracy90: Incredible! You're almost unstoppable in this horror battlefield!
performance.accuracy70: Great! You fought bravely against the darkness!
performance.accuracy50: Well done! Keep fighting, you're getting stronger!
performance.default: Every step is a new beginning! Rise and face the next horror!

result.loadingSubtitle: Soon, the outcome of your adventure will be revealed!
result.errorMessage: We couldnâ€™t find the specific result of your adventure. This might happen if you accessed this page directly. But donâ€™t worry, you can still view the room statistics.
result.title: Result

youWereKicked: You have been kicked from the room.
inviteMessage: Join the thrilling QuizRush game! Use code: {{roomCode}} or click here: {{joinLink}}
kickPlayerConfirm: Are you sure you want to kick {{nickname}}?
exitConfirm: Are you sure you want to leave?
durationTooltip: Select how long the game will last
questionTooltip: Number of questions for the game
durationError: Duration must be between 1 and 30 minutes!
